vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἴασπ-ῐς, ιδος
(but accusative ἴασπιν [Refs 5th c.AD+], ἡ, jasper, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II ={χρυσόγονον}, [Refs 1st c.AD+]. (Cf. Hebrew yāšpheh).
vocabInfos.mediumDef: jasper, a precious stone of various colors, as purple, cerulian green, etc. Rev. 4:3; 21:11, 18, 19*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jaspe (piedra semipreciosa de varios colores, pero el jaspe del NT era probablemente verde)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 水蒼玉,是一種具不同顏色的寶石(有紫色,藍色,綠色,或銅色)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 水苍玉,是一种具不同颜色的宝石(有紫色,蓝色,绿色,或铜色)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ngọc thạch anh; jatpe; thạch anh. Xem H3471
